entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 404 with _content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements/BlazorCustomElements.js #45558
  • Quarantine WriteAsJsonAsync_AsyncEnumerable_ClosedConnecton #45557
    Test failures
  • QuickGrid: Full support for localization #45556
    Backlog
  • Support for AuthN with JWT stored in session http-only cookies #45550
  • JSON polymorphic serialization does not add $type to single controller results #45548
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #45546

Closed

  • ISingleClientProxy.InvokeAsync<T> throwing System.Exception upon receiving return value from client invocations using messagepack protocol #45168
  • Perf regression: mvc #45547
  • Is it possible to start an Blazor project with custom headers? #45533
  • I want to send a domain_hint from Blazor Web Assembly (using Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.MsalWebAssemblyServiceCollectionExtensions.AddMsalAuthentication ) #29440 #45468
  • SignalR Server side InvokeCoreAsync blocks connection when client is not processing result async #45503
  • net7 blazor AuthorizeRouteView.NotAuthorized can not get AuthenticationState #45543
  • Perf regression: plaintext #45539
  • Perf regression: json, json_nodejs #45545

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45169
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 8.0-preview1
  • Improved rate limiting tests #45541
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add note about updating an existing installation #45518
    8.0-preview1
  • Cover C++ installation issue in BuildErrors #45521
    8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1f643f7` to `516940f` #45551
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `b95684a` to `dbbe162` #45552
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add compatibility suppression files to repo #45507
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • ApiAuthorizationDbContext.cs missing ServerSideSessions Patch #45145
    area-identity, community-contribution
